page.title: 05PARTRIDGE GREEN INDUSTRY
page.content: Partridge Green has 2 small INDUSTRIAL ESTATES:HUFFWOOD and STAR.One is near the centre of the village and the other is on the outskirts.Most of the FACTORIES employ women and most of these live locally.TRITEL make sellotape.Their goods come from Italy. GLENGROVE sell meat products.The average salary for a 38 hour week for a packer is Â£129.BIBLOS is a warehouse which stores books.About 20,000 books are despatched per day.An average wage is Â£100 per week.CERTIKINS makes swimming pool equipment,exporting it to 36 countries but not to America because it cannot compete there.The average salary is Â£170 per week.Approx.3 million tanks are made a day and the turnover is Â£15,000 per day.Some lorries and vans use the High Street for access and so disturb the peace of the village.
